synopsis.text:
Fuutarou, a dedicated part-time tutor, finds himself on a challenging mission to guide the stunning Nakano sisters, who are on the verge of academic failure and detest studying, towards their graduation. With just six months remaining in their high school journey and the final summer vacation on the horizon, Fuutarou decides to take a well-deserved break from his tutoring duties to focus on his own entrance exams, leaving the quintuplets disheartened by his absence. However, an unexpected phone call from Fuutarou turns the tables, promising a summer vacation filled with romance and comedy!

In this new adaptation of Gotoubun no Hanayomeâˆ½, viewers will be treated to previously unadapted stories from the original manga series. The spotlight shifts to Yotsuba, offering a unique perspective into her emotional world and various events that revolve around her. This special edition, which was pre-screened in Japanese theaters for three weeks starting July 14, 2023, guarantees a delightful blend of romance and comedy, making it a must-watch for fans of the original series and newcomers alike.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
